name: Visual portfolio template
description:
This is a portfolio template for sharing your work in a visual way.

Based on a 12 column grid, and developed in light and dark themes, it comes with two portfolio pages layout.

It is a simple template that allows you to create multiple layouts, and where imagery and bold and large-scaled texts are predominant.

I hope you find it useful.

Updates coming soon, including responsive design, about me section, and more layouts for the case study pages.
